sentence.Network_en: Leaf blade base cuneate, abaxial surface with gray - white indumentum; corolla magenta - rose.

sentence.Network_en: The abaxial stomatal resistance was smaller than the adaxial.

sentence.Network_en: The abaxial surface of a leaf is the underside or side facing away from the stem.
sentence.Network_cn: 树叶的离轴面是偏离的茎干的下面或侧面.
